turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'm looking to order a pizza from a new pizza place called Bella Luna for a pickup. Can you help me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I want to get two mediums with thin crusts. And I want to get bacon and pepperoni on one and extra cheese on the other.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, for the second pizza it's just cheese, no toppings?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 2 medium thin crust pizzas, 1 with bacon and pepperoni, and one with extra cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's fine. Well, will it be ready for pick up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome. That's all I needed. Thank you.
